pages.text: $(li)The Punch enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:weapons/glowsilk_bow)Glowsilk Bow$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the knockback strenght inflicted of your enemies of the $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrows$(/l) fires from the enchanted bow, pushing them further.
pages.title: Punch

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_punch)Ancient Tome (Punch)$(/l).
